definition: The term "bakteriell" refers to something related to microorganisms that are typically found in living organisms, causing various types of infections or diseases. It is commonly used in the context of describing medical conditions, treatments, or research related to bacteria.

examples.german: Die bakterielle Zellwand besteht aus Peptidoglykan.
examples.english: The bacterial cell wall is made up of peptidoglycan.

examples.german: Die bakterielle Vermehrung erfolgt durch Zellteilung.
examples.english: Bacterial reproduction occurs through cell division.

examples.german: Die bakterielle Resistenz gegen Antibiotika nimmt zu.
examples.english: Bacterial resistance to antibiotics is increasing.

examples.german: Die bakterielle Flora im Darm spielt eine wichtige Rolle f√ºr die Verdauung.
examples.english: The bacterial flora in the intestine plays an important role in digestion.
